Name: Arena Champion
About the game: 'Arena Champion' is a side-scrolling 2D arena shooter with frenzied dynamics and hundreds of armed enemies. The souls of sinners, whose bodies are at death's door, are tested in order to survive, defeat all enemies, open all arenas and survive on them in order to get a second chance at life. Survive in the arena for 5 minutes and kill as many enemies as possible! If you manage to stay alive, a new arena will open! Unlock all arenas! Gameplay features: Collect money from enemies to buy all 8 weapon types More experienced you get - more dangerous enemies will join the fight Use grappling hook to move fast and dodge projectiles Survive in arena for 5 minutes to unlock the next level Steam Achievements are supported!
